meza-ext-desc: Extension to capture all the little things meza (https://github.com/enterprisemediawiki/meza) wants
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-summ: The following jobs were added to the job queue to transfer pages from this wiki to $1:
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-dele: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]' and deleting page from this wiki
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-redi: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]' and redirecting this wiki's page there
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-dono: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]' and leaving this wiki unchanged
action-viewserverstatus: view Apache httpd and PHP info pages
